public class CollectTargetedPcrMetrics
extends CollectTargetedMetrics<TargetedPcrMetrics,TargetedPcrMetricsCollector>

Collect metric information for target pcr metrics runs. See CollectTargetedMetrics and TargetPcrMetricsCollector for more information
